comment: Smart Data Models - ExcREXS adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcREXS/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. General Purpose Rotating Excitation System Model.  This model can be used to represent a wide range of excitation systems whose DC power source is an AC or DC generator. It encompasses IEEE type AC1, AC2, DC1, and DC2 excitation system models.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: e1
contents.comment: Field voltage value 1 (E1).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: e2
contents.comment: Field voltage value 2 (E2).  Typical Value = 4. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fbf
contents.comment: Rate feedback signal flag (Fbf). Typical Value = fieldCurrent. Default: None

contents.name: flimf
contents.comment: Limit type flag (Flimf).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier regulation factor (Kc).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd
contents.comment: Exciter regulation factor (Kd).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter field proportional constant (Ke).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kefd
contents.comment: Field voltage feedback gain (Kefd).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Rate feedback gain (Kf).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: kh
contents.comment: Field voltage controller feedback gain (Kh).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kii
contents.comment: Field Current Regulator Integral Gain (Kii).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kip
contents.comment: Field Current Regulator Proportional Gain (Kip).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks
contents.comment: Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kvi
contents.comment: Voltage Regulator Integral Gain (Kvi).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kvp
contents.comment: Voltage Regulator Proportional Gain (Kvp).  Typical Value = 2800. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kvphz
contents.comment: V/Hz limiter gain (Kvphz).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: nvphz
contents.comment: Pickup speed of V/Hz limiter (Nvphz).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: se1
contents.comment: Saturation factor at E1 (Se1).  Typical Value = 0.0001. Default: 0.0

contents.name: se2
contents.comment: Saturation factor at E2 (Se2).  Typical Value = 0.001. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage Regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

contents.name: tb1
contents.comment: Lag time constant (Tb1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tb2
contents.comment: Lag time constant (Tb2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tc1
contents.comment: Lead time constant (Tc1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tc2
contents.comment: Lead time constant (Tc2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter field time constant (Te).  Typical Value = 1.2. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Rate feedback time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tf1
contents.comment: Feedback lead time constant (Tf1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tf2
contents.comment: Feedback lag time constant (Tf2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tp
contents.comment: Field current Bridge time constant (Tp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: vcmax
contents.comment: Maximum compounding voltage (Vcmax).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vfmax
contents.comment: Maximum Exciter Field Current (Vfmax).  Typical Value = 47. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vfmin
contents.comment: Minimum Exciter Field Current (Vfmin).  Typical Value = -20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimax
contents.comment: Voltage Regulator Input Limit (Vimax).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum controller output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 47. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum controller output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: xc
contents.comment: Exciter compounding reactance (Xc).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
